name: Ancient Explorer (ian_thorne99)
description:
Ancient Explorer is a 3D platformer where you'll play as an adventurer  who discovered an ancient temple. You'll jump over the temple's dangerous traps and fight your way through its undead enemies, all to take it's hidden treasures!

On your journey through the temple, you'll encounter:

  • Ancient traps like fire and spikes
  • Undead mummies, guarding the temple's riches
  • TREASURE!!!!

Can you claim the temple's treasures as your own and make it out alive?

If you'd like to read more about my development process and the game in general, check out it's Artstation page here.

Created by Ian T.
